casebody.data:
Nicholas PAPATHANASIOU, Petitioner, v. UNITED STATES of America, Respondent. No. 368, Docket 26784. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued May 1, 1961. Decided May 2, 1961.

Before LUMBARD, Chief Judge, CLARK, Circuit Judge and STEEL, District J udge.*

Nicholas Tsoucalas, New York City, for petitioner. Walter C. Reid, Asst. U. S. Atty., Eastern District of New York, Brooklyn, N. Y. (Cornelius W. Wickersham, Jr., U. S. *931Atty., Brooklyn, N. Y., on the brief), for respondent.

Sitting by designation.

 PER CURIAM.

We affirm the order of the district court that the petitioner be admitted to naturalization for the reasons stated by Judge Bruehhausen in his opinion. See also United States v. Rosner, 1 Cir., 1957, 249 F.2d 49.
